itunes:title: Episode 629 - OG Vincent “Rocco” Vargas Returns!
title: Episode 629 - OG Vincent “Rocco” Vargas Returns!
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome our OG Host Vincent “Rocco” Vargas to discuss what has happened in Hollywood before and during the quarantine, Rocco updates us on his family and how he balances working a normal job with acting professionally in m...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome our OG Host Vincent “Rocco” Vargas to discuss what has happened in Hollywood before and during the quarantine, Rocco updates us on his family and how he balances working a normal job with acting professionally in movies and television, the three discuss how Tik Tok is taking over and in one marine’s case, ruined his life, and Rocco ends the show with “The Outpost” dilemma involving its original author Clinton Romesha and Jake Tapper’s film adaptation of Romesha’s story.

Ghostbed.com/DrinkinBros 

www.beteran.com
